name.en: Aris Quest: To Become a Legend
name.jp: Aris Quest: To Become a Legend

desc.en: Adamant on leveling up and showcasing her new unlocks, Aris embarks on another adventure with Sensei. Aris and Sensei destroy trash cans for loot, get into random encounters with thugs and bullies, and generally have a legendary adventure.
desc.jp: Adamant on leveling up and showcasing her new unlocks, Aris embarks on another adventure with Sensei. Aris and Sensei destroy trash cans for loot, get into random encounters with thugs and bullies, and generally have a legendary adventure.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}说升级之后会让老师看新解锁的功能，再次和老师展开冒险。为了找出道具而破坏垃圾桶，通过随机计算遇到小流氓等，{cf爱丽丝}和老师展开了日后会成为传说的冒险。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Kirino and Sensei stop a robbery while pursuing a suspected terrorist. After the commotion settles down, they learn the suspicious object the suspect held was actually nukazuke and not a bomb.
desc.jp: Kirino and Sensei stop a robbery while pursuing a suspected terrorist. After the commotion settles down, they learn the suspicious object the suspect held was actually nukazuke and not a bomb.
desc.zh_cn: 来到市区巡逻的{cf桐乃}与老师在追捕恐怖攻击嫌疑犯的途中，阻止了一件强盗案。而在一阵骚动以后，发现嫌疑犯所持有的可疑物品不是炸弹，而是渍物。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sensei visits Megu and finds her looking at Morimori, a quickly melting ice cream treat. It turns out that Megu was using her flamethrower to thaw it, and Sensei suggests that she wait a bit instead.
desc.jp: Sensei visits Megu and finds her looking at Morimori, a quickly melting ice cream treat. It turns out that Megu was using her flamethrower to thaw it, and Sensei suggests that she wait a bit instead.
desc.zh_cn: 老师去找{cf惠}，发现{cf惠}正在专心看着逐渐融化的「咯哩咯哩君」冰淇淋。{cf惠}正在使用自己的武器让咯哩咯哩君融化，老师则建议她试着等一下。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Sensei goes on patrol with Mine. They're faced with a host of troubles. Mine is determined that she must be more decisive in order to save lives. After the patrol, Mine asks Sensei to join the Remedial Knights.

desc.en: Misaki and Sensei go to the riverside to get some air, but Sensei wonders why Misaki is wearing a mask while walking. Just as Misaki is about to explain she's allergic to pollen, she sneezes out of nowhere, and Sensei lends her a handkerchief.
desc.jp: Misaki and Sensei go to the riverside to get some air, but Sensei wonders why Misaki is wearing a mask while walking. Just as Misaki is about to explain she's allergic to pollen, she sneezes out of nowhere, and Sensei lends her a handkerchief.
desc.zh_cn: 到江边吹风的{cf美咲}和老师。老师很好奇{cf美咲}为什么在散步时也一直戴着口罩。正当{cf美咲}想回答说是因为花粉过敏的瞬间，突然打了个喷嚏，于是老师把手帕借给了{cf美咲}。

desc.en: 美咲向老師發來訊息，說自己已經確認好了下一個目的地。老師讓美咲注意安全，並希望能告訴他發生了什麼。
desc.jp: 美咲向老師發來訊息，說自己已經確認好了下一個目的地。老師讓美咲注意安全，並希望能告訴他發生了什麼。
desc.zh_cn: {cf美咲}向老师发来消息，说自己已经确认好了下一个目的地。老师让{cf美咲}注意安全，并希望能告诉他发生了什么。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 老師又去見了美咲，同先前一樣，美咲還是不領情。就在美咲準備走的時候，老師提議一同去散步，加深些感情。美咲一開始雖否認了所謂緣分和感情，但最後還是同意了老師的請求。
desc.jp: 老師又去見了美咲，同先前一樣，美咲還是不領情。就在美咲準備走的時候，老師提議一同去散步，加深些感情。美咲一開始雖否認了所謂緣分和感情，但最後還是同意了老師的請求。
desc.zh_cn: 老师又去见了{cf美咲}，同先前一样，{cf美咲}还是不领情。就在{cf美咲}准备走的时候，老师提议一同去散步，加深些感情。{cf美咲}一开始虽否认了所谓缘分和感情，但最后还是同意了老师的请求。

desc.en: Sensei runs into Shiroko while traveling to Abydos High School for work, and they end up walking there together. Along the way, Sensei finds out that Shiroko has gotten a drone. They're immediately concerned by her motivations. Eventually, Sensei decides that Shiroko's Protection Mode is going too far and puts a stop to it.
desc.jp: Sensei runs into Shiroko while traveling to Abydos High School for work, and they end up walking there together. Along the way, Sensei finds out that Shiroko has gotten a drone. desc.zh_cn: 老师因为有事而前往{sn阿拜多斯}高中，偶然遇见了{cf白子}，于是两人便一起去学校。途中老师看见{cf白子}取得了无人机，老师因此觉得很担心。后来因为认为{cf白子}的防护模式太超过了，老师便出手制止了她。

desc.en: Sensei is in the area of Yuzu's maid cafe and goes to check on her at work. Yuzu, nervous about Sensei's visit, makes a series of mistakes which are very unusual for her. When Yuzu doesn't come back after her break, Sensei goes looking for her. However, what they find isn't what they expected.
desc.jp: Sensei is in the area of Yuzu's maid cafe and goes to check on her at work. Yuzu, nervous about Sensei's visit, makes a series of mistakes which are very unusual for her. When Yuzu doesn't come back after her break, Sensei goes looking for her. However, what they find isn't what they expected.
desc.zh_cn: 外勤中的老师为了观察{cf柚子}的状况，于是便前往她打工的女仆咖啡厅。老师的出现让{cf柚子}顿时很紧张，表现失常接二连三发生了失误。稍后。休息时间已经过了，{cf柚子}依旧没有回来，老师基于担心就去找{cf柚子}，因此看见了令人意外的景象。

name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cn对策委员会}学生们跟踪{cf茜香}，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是{cf茜香}依然一副没好气的样子。{cf茜香}在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.zh_cn: 老师撞见了{cf茜香}，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。{cf茜香}躲闪着，但老师{cf步}{cf步}紧跟；{cf茜香}后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.jp: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_cn: 老师带着{cn对策委员会}的其它人来到了{cf茜香}打工的拉面店，{cf茜香}大为震撼。然后，{cf茜香}带领大家就坐；之后，{cf野乃美}主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在{cf茜香}的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.jp: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.zh_cn: 老师为前往{sn阿拜多斯}的便利屋送行。另一方面，{cf绫音}和{cf茜香}一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。

desc.en: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.jp: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.zh_cn: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与{cn风纪委员会}的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。{cf亚瑠}表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示{cf亚瑠}真是令人操心。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.
desc.jp: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.
desc.zh_cn: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。{cf亚瑠}表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回{sn阿拜多斯}看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着{cn便利屋68}东西的卡车随后消失在路口。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.jp: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.zh_cn: {cf绫音}和{cf茜香}前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，{sn阿拜多斯}土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。

desc.en: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.jp: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}和{sn千年}的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和{cn工程师部}见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来{cf爱丽丝}遇见{cf宁瑠}，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在{cf爱丽丝}也能笑着说{cf宁瑠}是自己的同伴。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在{sn千年}广场遇到了{sn其他}{sn千年}的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途{cf爱丽丝}还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Aris met the three of the Engineering Department. The three said they were out seeking for some new equipments. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Aris met more people at other places, until she saw a familiar figure at the subway.

desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在更多地方见到了更多的人，直到在车站遇见了一个熟悉的身影。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}叫{cf宁瑠}“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和{cf爱丽丝}到了游戏厅。不出所料，{cf宁瑠}不断输给了{cf爱丽丝}，尽管{cf爱丽丝}已经教了她相当一段时间。{cf宁瑠}虽然非常恼火{cf爱丽丝}评价她的水平不好，但还是请教{cf爱丽丝}连招的操作。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.jp: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.zh_cn: 老师对{cf爱丽丝}居然不害怕{cf宁瑠}感到惊讶，而{cf爱丽丝}则表示是因为{cf宁瑠}现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解{cf爱丽丝}的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成{cf柚子}布置的任务，但{cf爱丽丝}还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。

desc.en: With Mine's remediation, the incident with the thugs is resolved. However, to Mine's dismay, the Public Peace Bureau failed to appear. While Mine questions why they couldn't be dispatched and lodges her complaints, Wakamo escapes to freedom.

desc.zh_cn: {cf美祢}的救援行动虽然平息了小流氓们的骚动，但{cn公安局}依旧没有出动。听见{cn公安局}没有出动的理由后，{cf美祢}提出强烈的抗议，{cf若藻}则趁机从容地逃走了。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
